Trigger A creature with an active spell effect within 30 feet of the azuretzi fails to resist another azuretzi's Mocking Touch

Effect The azuretzi attempts to counteract one ongoing spell effect on the target creature with a Thievery check. If it is successful, it transfers the ongoing spell effect to itself. The creature then becomes temporarily immune to Spell Pilfer for 24 hours.

b9sqjjGGkWII8xxu.name: Mimic Form
b9sqjjGGkWII8xxu.description: As @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.eQM5hQ1W3d1uen97]{Change Shape} but an azuretzi can assume the specific form of a Medium or smaller creature it Seeks with a successful @Check[type:perception|dc:25] check. It can return to its true form as a free action. It can retain access to only one exact appearance at a time.

voMMMHUogUu7LSeF.name: Mocking Touch
voMMMHUogUu7LSeF.description:
Requirements The azuretzi is not currently using Mocking Touch on a spell

Effect The azuretzi mocks a creature's magical ability with a touch. The azuretzi must attempt a Thievery check against the target's Will DC.

Critical Success The azuretzi chooses one spell of up to 3rd level that the target creature has available to cast. The azuretzi gains that spell as a mock divine innate spell, and it can cast that spell once as an innate divine spell using its own DC and spell attack. It must do so before 24 hours pass or the mock spell is lost. The creature touched cannot cast the mock spell until the azuretzi casts it first or the 24 hour period passes, whichever comes first.

Success As critical success, but the azuretzi has 1 hour to cast the mock spell before it is lost, and the creature touched can cast the spell normally.

Failure As critical success, but the azuretzi must cast the mock spell before the end of its next turn or it is lost, and the creature touched can cast the spell normally.

Critical Failure Mocking Touch has no effect.

Babau.name: Babau
Babau.publicNotes: The babau is an assassin, a murderer, and a sadist-certainly not unusual traits, yet their penchant for stealth and surprise sets them apart from their kin. Babaus form from mortal souls of lone killers-those who took pleasure in more personal murders, and particularly those with grisly patterns to their killings.

5oQstrPyIsACaBES.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
5oQstrPyIsACaBES.description:
你能看见 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

d3GX5vViofz5foXq.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
d3GX5vViofz5foXq.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

wEzrLhyzfEwcfMlc.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

R1voQq09UIwdTVP5.name: Mercy Vulnerability
R1voQq09UIwdTVP5.description: Babaus revel in gore, and when wounds are healed, they recoil in pain. When a creature heals from damage that the babau dealt on their last turn with Grievous Strike, sneak attack, or a critical hit, the demon takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6 mental damage}. The babau can take this mental damage only once per round.

pMGUO0z7GhIrgGlF.name: Reactive Slime
pMGUO0z7GhIrgGlF.description:
Trigger A creature within the babau's reach successfully hits the babau with a Strike

Effect The babau excretes a gout of acidic, bloodlike slime against the attacker and its weapon. The attacker must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:24|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The attacker is unaffected.

Success The attacker takes [[/r {1d6}[acid]]]{1d6 acid damage}.

Failure The attacker takes [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6 acid damage}.

Critical Failure As failure, except the weapon used to Strike the babau becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}, unless the weapon is made of a material that is immune to acid.

JcDvmYqI4o86358N.name: Grievous Strike
JcDvmYqI4o86358N.description: The babau attacks with the intent of creating a particularly horrific and gory wound. The babau makes a melee Strike. This counts as two attacks when calculating the demon's multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, the babau deals an additional [[/r 2d6]] damage of the same damage type, and the creature struck is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

IM4bochbTpbrXxfY.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
IM4bochbTpbrXxfY.description:
The babau's Strikes deal an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Badger.name: Badger
Badger.publicNotes: The typical badger has dark, brownish-gray fur highlighted with white markings, particularly on the head, giving it a striped mask of fur around its eyes. A threatened badger can swiftly become a ferocious combatant that typically fights until slain.

IKRXYrbZOj22lXn8.name: 凶猛 Ferocity
IKRXYrbZOj22lXn8.description:
Trigger The monster is reduced to 0 HP.

Effect The monster avoids being knocked out and remains at 1 HP, but its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{wounded} value increases by 1. When it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{wounded 3}, it can no longer use this ability

Baobhan Sith.name: Baobhan Sith
Baobhan Sith.publicNotes:
Undeath is rare in the fey realm of the First World, for that plane's infusion with the raw power of life makes undead uncomfortable at best. Yet a few fey have adopted the vile practices and habits of notorious undead while still being living themselves, as seen in the blood-drinking habits of the murderous baobhan sith.

A baobhan sith avoids confrontations when outnumbered, and although territorial, they won't reveal their true nature to larger groups. They prefer to drink blood from victims they find attractive, and they avoid drinking blood from animals and beasts entirely, as they consider such activities to be uncultured.

Wj4PwJFZfcVXdLml.name: 读心术(随意施法) Mind Reading (At will)
Wj4PwJFZfcVXdLml.description:
你通过一次短暂的心灵接触来尝试阅读目标的想法。它必须尝试一次意志豁免。目标会暂时免疫你的读心术1小时。

大成功 目标得知当施放该法术时你模糊的表层想法。

成功 你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

失败 你得知当施放该法术时目标模糊的表层想法，并且你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

大失败 如失败，并且在法术持续时间中，你可以维持该法术来再次侦测目标的表层想法。目标不会获得另外的豁免。

fxZztiCJybeYYeOI.name: Captivating Dance
fxZztiCJybeYYeOI.description:
The baobhan sith sways rhythmically and Strides up to their Speed. Each creature within 30 feet of the baobhan sith at the end of their movement must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Captivating Dance for 24 hours.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round and is temporarily immune to Captivating Dance for 24 hours.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, and it must spend at least 1 of its actions on each of its turns to move closer to the baobhan sith as expediently as possible, while avoiding obvious dangers. If the creature ends its movement or turn adjacent to the fey, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature must spend each of its actions moving closer to the baobhan sith, and if it ends its movement or turn adjacent to the fey, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

KIhN4LqmxLYnSLJj.name: Change Shape
KIhN4LqmxLYnSLJj.description:
The baobhan sith can transform into a large raven, with the effects from the bird option in the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.NzXpEzcZAjuDTZjK]{Aerial Form} spell.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

bJUTz62klSlUEuTo.name: Drink Blood
bJUTz62klSlUEuTo.description:
Requirements A bleeding creature is within the baobhan sith's reach

Effect The baobhan sith tries to Drink the Blood from the bleeding creature's wounds. The baobhan sith attempts an Athletics check against the victim's Fortitude DC. On a success, the victim becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and the baobhan sith regains 10 HP, gaining any Hit Points in excess of their maximum Hit Points as temporary Hit Points.

Drinking Blood from a victim that's already drained doesn't restore any Hit Points to the baobhan sith but increases the victim's drained value by 1. A victim's drained condition decreases by 1 per week. A blood transfusion, which requires 10 minutes, a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:20] check, and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drained value by 1.

Basidirond.name: Basidirond
Basidirond.publicNotes: The basidirond, also called a mindfrond, is a fungal creature that crawls about on woody tendrils. The large, bowl-shaped pod atop its body collects mineral-rich moisture--whether runoff from cave walls or fresh blood--for sustenance. It uses hallucinogenic spores to incapacitate prey long enough for it to beat its prey to a bloody pulp, then deposits the deliciously tenderized remains into this pod for consumption. A basidirond is over 6 feet tall and 3 to 4 feet wide, and weighs nearly 300 pounds when saturated.

MiX1rLReSocMJdta.name: Cold Lethargy
MiX1rLReSocMJdta.description: Although a basidirond is immune to cold damage, any effect that deals cold damage causes it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}. During this time, it cannot use its Hallucinogenic Cloud or basidirond spores.

2OIZKsg9vZrNrBBw.name: Basidirond Spores
2OIZKsg9vZrNrBBw.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8 poison damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {1d10}[poison]]]{1d10 poison damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12 poison damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

3GOGRqIhDzmef7he.name: Hallucinogenic Cloud
3GOGRqIhDzmef7he.description:
The basidirond releases a cloud of invisible spores in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save or experience powerful hallucinations as long as it remains in the cloud, plus an additional [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} after leaving the area. A creature must attempt a new save each round it remains within the area. The cloud persists for 5 rounds unless dispersed before then by a strong wind. Each hallucinating creature rolls [[/r 1d6]] each round to determine what it hallucinates that round.

  1. The target is sinking in quicksand. It falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and spends 1 action on its next turn flailing its limbs as if attempting to swim.
  2. The target is attacked by a swarm of spiders. It spends 2 actions on its next turn attacking the floor with a melee weapon (drawing a weapon if needed). It is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against all attacks.
  3. An item the target is holding turns into a viper. The target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.wQYmDStjdjn0I26t]{Release} the item and spends its next turn fleeing from it.
  4. The target is suffocating. It holds its breath and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3}.
  5. The target shrinks to 1/10 its normal size. For 1 round it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4}, and takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed.
  6. The target is melting. It drops everything it's holding and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 4} for 1 round.

Bastion Archon.name: Bastion Archon
Bastion Archon.publicNotes:
The mightiest of archon-kind form in the heat of battle from incredibly uncommon circumstances. When a gathering of lantern archons converges into a gestalt in order to defend allies in a fight that seems all but lost, a fellow archon of significant strength-such as a star archon-can commit a brave act of self-sacrifice by dimensionally transposing itself with the gestalt. If the circumstances are just right and luck is with the archons, the result is not a glorious sacrifice, but instead the earth-rocking emergence of a bastion archon. In this way, the lowliest of archons-the lanterns-can, in an instant, become their kind's greatest hope.

Bastion archons are massive beings made of the very stone of Heaven's Holy Mountain, with their visages obscured by a blinding light surrounding the gestalt that originally formed the bastion. Tireless in their embodiment of the virtue of sacrifice, a bastion archon almost always protects the area where they manifested, and even when they are destroyed they leave an indelible mark of righteousness upon the surrounding region.
Bastion Archon.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

pLU70j6ysOj7eVT8.name: 凌空而行(恒定法术) Air Walk (Constant)
pLU70j6ysOj7eVT8.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

ybPZgyruroPBZ9gc.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
ybPZgyruroPBZ9gc.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

3n0E4BJ7jYbNm4ux.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
3n0E4BJ7jYbNm4ux.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

2VooFbfGeZCEGVLM.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At will)
2VooFbfGeZCEGVLM.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

uW30KxL4NUlDPAi5.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

QPrrVmViA5QTr6tE.name: Bastion Aura
QPrrVmViA5QTr6tE.description:
50 feet.

All good-aligned creatures in the aura have @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} 30 for as long as they remain in range, and they gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

2KSiu60tktdQLiFE.name: Ultimate Sacrifice
2KSiu60tktdQLiFE.description: If the bastion archon is slain by an evil creature, it explodes in a geyser of holy light, restoring 140 HP to all good-aligned creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40]. The ground in the affected area is also subjected to a level 10 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dbd5W6G8U2vzWolN]{Consecrate} ritual, and the ground is consecrated for 10 years (or only 24 hours if the ultimate sacrifice took place in Hell, Abaddon, or the Abyss).

xa0P6lS6jAgU3iPX.name: Archon's Door
xa0P6lS6jAgU3iPX.description: Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}, the archon can use dimension door (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon's dimension door. If the archon's dimension door has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either creature used dimension door.

LpnkFiQmJ2nxDYm5.name: Blinding Beams
LpnkFiQmJ2nxDYm5.description:
Trigger The bastion archon hits a creature with two fist Strikes this turn and can use its Holy Beam

Effect The bastion archon fires its Holy Beam at only the creature it hit twice. The creature's save result is one degree of success worse than the result it rolled.

itoyZJLBh98BavI1.name: Entrench
itoyZJLBh98BavI1.description: The bastion archon locks itself in place, becoming voluntarily @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. While Entrenched, the archon can't be forcibly moved or tripped, and it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves. Entrench ends automatically as soon as the bastion archon uses another move action.

DpIIIQSKrhsFKToW.name: Holy Beam
DpIIIQSKrhsFKToW.description:
The bastion archon releases a blinding beam of holy light in a @Template[type:line|distance:500] that deals [[/r {20d6}[good]]]{20d6 good damage} to non-archons in the area, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:38|traits:damaging-effect] save.

The bastion archon can't use Holy Beam again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is blinded permanently.

Bebilith.name: Bebilith
Bebilith.publicNotes:
While demons control much of the Abyss, even they are hunted in the wilder regions of this horrific plane. The most notorious of these predators-though not the deadliest-is the bebilith. These fiends resemble elephant-sized spiders with glowing eyes, barbed chitin, and a fanged maw dripping caustic fluid.

Many demons and planar travelers have underestimated bebiliths' devious intellects, believing them to be little more than oversized vermin. Bebiliths take advantage of this, ambushing foes with unexpected tactics. While they lash out at any creatures they encounter, they take great pleasure in chewing on demonic flesh. Qlippoth are the only creatures bebiliths never consume.
Bebilith.senses: darkvision, scent demons 60 feet, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

d5mwrX7WIXXz8R97.name: 异界传送(仅限自身) Plane Shift (Self Only)
d5mwrX7WIXXz8R97.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

jBybuNj39jNUTdkz.name: Scent Demons 60 feet
jBybuNj39jNUTdkz.description: A bebilith can smell demons as a precise sense.

2tplJgSAMF7CmPNN.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

V9cC85qOc8a3vbBc.name: Abyssal Rot
V9cC85qOc8a3vbBc.description:
The drained condition from Abyssal rot is cumulative, to a maximum of drained 4.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 negative damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 negative damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 negative damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

KtaZ7mxQIQwm19ZM.name: Dimensional Tether
KtaZ7mxQIQwm19ZM.description:
A creature hit by the bebilith's web Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} and tethered to the bebilith, preventing it from moving further away from the bebilith. The restrained creature is also under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor} spell (DC 29) with a duration that lasts as long as the creature remains tethered. The bebilith can have only one creature tethered at a time.

The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SjmKHgI7a5Z9JzBx]{Force Open} the tether is 29. The tether can be severed with a Strike (AC 20, Hardness 2, HP 20); this ends the dimensional anchor effect but does not free the restrained creature.

MLD9Fi3IkozFjlXZ.name: Penetrating Strike
MLD9Fi3IkozFjlXZ.description: Against demons, a bebilith's Strikes count as cold iron and good.

Behemoth Hippopotamus.name: Behemoth Hippopotamus
Behemoth Hippopotamus.publicNotes: Behemoth hippopotamuses stand taller than elephants. They spend less time out of water than their smaller kin. Behemoth hippos are omnivorous, and many enjoy the taste of meat.

zhobc1PADu4qQ2LB.name: Deep Breath
zhobc1PADu4qQ2LB.description: The behemoth hippopotamus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

IWyA3McLAMxHc0jq.name: Capsize
IWyA3McLAMxHc0jq.description: The behemoth hippopotamus tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The behemoth hippopotamus must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 30 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the hippo) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

nyh1lXyTGoUctOzo.name: Double Chomp
nyh1lXyTGoUctOzo.description: The behemoth hippo makes a jaws Strike targeting two creatures adjacent to each other. Roll the attack and damage once, and apply it to each creature separately. A Double Chomp counts as two attacks for the multiple attack penalty.

Behir.name: Behir
Behir.publicNotes: The behir is a massive, serpentine beast with never fewer than a dozen short legs, each ending in three hooked talons. A behir can live to 80 years, but most perish far younger to violence. Fully grown, a behir is 40 feet long and weighs 4,000 pounds.

6i7GkvP5XmSn8g6G.name: Breath Weapon
6i7GkvP5XmSn8g6G.description:
The behir breathes lightning that deals [[/r {9d6}[electricity]]]{9d6 electricity damage} in an @Template[type:line|distance:60] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save).

It can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

hS50gj87pD1XnQk9.name: Claw Storm
hS50gj87pD1XnQk9.description: The behir Strides up to its Speed, during which it can walk on air as if it were solid ground, ascending or descending at up to a 45-degree angle. It can make up to four claw Strikes at any point during this movement, each against a different target within reach, and it deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[electricity]]]{1d6 electricity damage} with each Strike. These attacks count toward the behir's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the behir makes all of its attacks. If the behir moves half its Speed or less during a Claw Storm, that movement doesn't trigger reactions. The behir can't use Claw Storm if it has a creature wrapped in its coils. At the end of Claw Storm, it drifts downward up to 60 feet to the ground, landing softly and taking no damage from the fall. If it descends further than 60 feet, it takes damage normally from the remaining fall.

7wi6tn6G6vLyc1tN.name: Wrap in Coils
7wi6tn6G6vLyc1tN.description:
Requirements The behir has a creature either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} in its jaws

Effect The behir moves the creature into its coils, freeing its jaws. The creature remains grabbed and takes [[/r {1d6+6}[slashing]]]{1d6+6 slashing damage}. The behir's coils can hold as many creatures as will fit in its space.

Belker.name: Belker
Belker.publicNotes: These reclusive elementals have glowing red eyes, leathery wings, and long, sharp claws. While they always retain their shape, belkers can control the solidity of their forms at will, transforming into clouds of smoke, ash, and dust.

FTeRIF51hvaZAOzR.name: Smoke Vision
FTeRIF51hvaZAOzR.description: The belker ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from smoke.

0llDJD2BXJrr95lm.name: Smoke Form
0llDJD2BXJrr95lm.description: The belker can occupy the same space as other creatures.

R8bzIOrsR2PFpnSQ.name: Noxious Fumes
R8bzIOrsR2PFpnSQ.description:
Requirements The belker occupies the same space as a Medium or smaller creature

Effect The belker attempts to flow into the creature's lungs; the creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save. On a failure, the creature partially inhales the belker and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} by the pain of the smoke rasping in its throat and lungs. The creature can attempt to exhale the belker by spending an action coughing and succeeding at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save. Most of the belker remains outside the creature, so the belker can still act normally. If the belker moves out of the creature's space or uses Noxious Fumes again, the creature automatically exhales it.

UN8cAG3SmdTtuDWe.name: Smoke Slash
UN8cAG3SmdTtuDWe.description:
Requirements The belker is partially inhaled by a creature

Effect The belker automatically deals its claw damage to the inhaling creature by forming a claw to slash and scrape the creature from within.

Black Bear.name: Black Bear
Black Bear.publicNotes: Contrary to the name, black bears can be cinnamon or even blond in coloration, depending on which hue is most beneficial for surviving in their local environment. Regardless of their coloration, they are opportunistic eaters who gain sustenance from berries and nuts just as often as from fish and smaller mammals. They steal food when they find it, including from humanoid camps. Although they are predators, black bears are more timid than other bears. Unless defending themselves or their young, black bears often avoid conflict or fight only until they can retreat.

2xM4lSOsw2nfs2tu.name: Mauler
2xM4lSOsw2nfs2tu.description: The black bear gains a +1 circumstance bonus to damage rolls against creatures it has grabbed.

Black Dracolisk.name: Black Dracolisk
Black Dracolisk.publicNotes: Dracolisks are rare magical crossbreeds of chromatic dragons and basilisks. None now know how they first came to be, but they have proven viable and can breed with one another as well as with basilisks. While a dracolisk appears much like a young true dragon of its parent type, its eight legs are an immediate indication that it is something more. Its coloration varies, depending on the nature of its draconic ancestry, though it's lighter on its underside and darker near its wing tips. A typical dracolisk is 15 feet long and weighs 3,000 pounds.

tygj3hMG88FeH6W1.name: Draconic Resistance
tygj3hMG88FeH6W1.description: A dracolisk has resistance 10 to the type of damage it produces with its breath weapon.

5aqMBttykiS0SKAb.name: Petrifying Glance
5aqMBttykiS0SKAb.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet that the dracolisk can see starts its turn

Effect The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute as its body stiffens.

OBXLT5RlRI6AauZ1.name: Breath Weapon
OBXLT5RlRI6AauZ1.description:
The dracolisk breathes a gout of energy based on its draconic heritage, as noted below. This breath weapon deals [[/r {6d10}[acid]]]{6d10 acid damage}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save.

The dracolisk can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Black @Template[type:line|distance:60] of acid

OxZGoHvhVubVXMm4.name: Petrifying Gaze
OxZGoHvhVubVXMm4.description:
The dracolisk stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save. If it fails and has not already been slowed by Petrifying Glance or this ability, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. If the creature already was slowed by this ability or Petrifying Glance, a failed save causes the creature to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} permanently.

A creature petrified in this manner can be instantly restored to flesh by being coated (not just splashed) with fresh dracolisk or basilisk blood no more than 1 hour old. A single dracolisk contains enough blood to coat [[/r 1d4+2 #Medium creatures]] Medium creatures in this manner.

9tukJ8Am3f00bHUu.name: Savage Jaws
9tukJ8Am3f00bHUu.description: The dracolisk makes a single Strike with its jaws. If the attack hits, it deals [[/r {4d12+16}[piercing]]]{4d12+16 piercing damage} (versatile S). This counts as two attacks for its multiple attack penalty.

Blindheim.name: Blindheim
Blindheim.publicNotes:
Inhabitants of damp, subterranean caves, blindheims resemble stubby humanoids with oversized, frog-like heads and bulbous eyes. Their eyes emit a soft glow at all times, but a blindheim can draw back the heavy membrane that normally covers them to emit an intense light as bright as day. These simple creatures use their lights to draw in or disorient prey, mostly small animals like lizards, rodents, or fish. However, they might go after larger prey if trying to feed their young. When they encounter creatures their own size or larger they retreat, flashing their eyes to facilitate their escape if necessary. They often hunt in pairs or small packs. Using their lights to coordinate from a distance, they slowly close in on the creatures they hunt. One common hunting pattern involves one blindheim diving deep and using its light to chase fish to the surface, while another up above snatches them up and tosses them onto the land to eat later.

Blindheims make their nests in damp caverns, especially grottoes next to underground lakes or bogs. An ideal nest rests in a cozy cavern with plenty of fungus to eat, a few fish swimming in a lake, and the comforting drip of water from the ceiling. Blindheims prefer to lead quiet and serene lives, and even when first born they emit only the meekest of vocalizations. A blindheim is born shining, and its parents cuddle over it to dim the light so as to avoid attracting predators.

It's not just animals that endanger blindheims. Underground peoples find the creatures useful and attempt to capture them for specialized purposes. Duergars use them as "raid frogs," placing heavy hoods over blindheims' heads and revealing them suddenly during raids to blind their foes. They sometimes send the creatures along with their slaves that lack darkvision into the mines as a source of light. Drow use them for some of these same purposes, and some nobles have been known to treat the creatures as mere lanterns, having them hoisted to the ceilings of their halls. Neither duergars nor drow take good care of the captive creatures, so blindheims rarely last long in captivity.

7MiqMH6uob5zPB4e.name: Spotlight
7MiqMH6uob5zPB4e.description:
Bright light shines from the blindheim's eyes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] (also creating dim light to 60 feet). Each creature in the bright light when the blindheim uses this action, or who enters it while the light continues, must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save. It is then temporarily immune for 1 hour. This light remains until the blindheim dims its eyes by using this action again.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is Blinded for 1 hour.

Blink Dog.name: Blink Dog
Blink Dog.publicNotes:
At first glance, blink dogs seem to be little more than long-eared, bearded canines with tawny coats. Yet their intelligent eyes and the blue nimbus of energy that dances across their fur hint at not only the blink dog's inherent intelligence, but also of their connection to the occult energies and mysteries that hide beyond the sight of the untrained eye. These honorable creatures are as intelligent as most humanoids. They live and hunt in large packs, roaming forests, plains, and the hidden places of the world in hunt for evil creatures-particularly those that dwell in the depths of the Ethereal Plane.

Unless acting in concert with specific allies who have proven that their goals are shared, blink dogs tend to avoid other creatures if at all possible. Their packs are constantly on the move and hidden from those that would seek them out. But in times of need, they have been known to come to the rescue of villages and lost travelers. While they have no innate ability to travel to the Ethereal Plane for extended periods of time, all blink dogs constantly shimmer and ripple between the Material Plane and the Ethereal. They do their best to use their ability to blink to snatch glimpses into the Ethereal Plane and keep track of potential threats that might be building there, but in practice this tactic yields more of a constant stream of hunches and estimations of Ethereal-based threats. Of course, to a blink dog, this constant state of flux is as natural as breathing.

Pack leadership always falls to a pair-an elder blink dog (called an alpha) who relies upon the valued guidance of a trusted pack mate (the sage). Honor and tradition are keystones of blink dog society. They are fiercely loyal, defending the pack or creatures they befriend to the death and maintaining oaths handed down from litter to litter. Though different packs hold different traditions and oaths, their connection through the tales and stories told among their kind and the shared experience of the movement of stars above weave all blink dogs into an extended family, a great pack. Through their myths and folklore, blink dogs have names for celestial phenomena, note births under auspicious stars, and read omens from unusual stellar conjunctions. These celestial signs are woven into blink dogs' lifeways; their names contain a reference to the specific constellation under which they were born, and a pack's sage watches the heavens for signs to help them decide when a pup is old enough for their first hunt.

6MFcZa19cUunLJRu.name: 闪现术(恒定法术) Blink (Constant)
6MFcZa19cUunLJRu.description:
你在物质位面和灵界位面之间快速闪现。你对所有伤害获得抗力5（除了力场）。你可以维持法术，消失不见并在10尺内由GM决定的随机方位上出现；该移动不会触发反应动作。在你的回合结束时，你会如上文所述地快速消失又重新出现。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ZlsuhS9J0S3PuvCO]{法术效果：闪现术}

升阶 (+2) 该抗力提高3。

h155XUVgiUJ5onse.name: Blink Resistances
h155XUVgiUJ5onse.description: Due to the constant @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.zR67Rt3UMHKC5evy]{Blink} spell, we have added resistance to all 5 (except force) to the stat block, even though it is not listed in the official book.

YSVs60IJmBC8CFXN.name: Pack Attack
YSVs60IJmBC8CFXN.description: The blink dog's Strikes deal an additional [[/r 1d4]] damage to creatures within the reach of at least two of the blink dog's allies.

Blizzardborn.name: Blizzardborn
Blizzardborn.publicNotes: Freezing and thawing in a near-constant loop, blizzardborn resemble humanoid forms composed of a mixture of partially melted snow and sleet. These elementals move with crunching strides, their bodies constantly sloshing and sloughing off shards of ice. Because of their ability to refreeze, blizzardborn can travel into warmer environments safely, though they tend to look more like slush in these areas.

IWFZQHALE4qFDWJv.name: Snow Vision
IWFZQHALE4qFDWJv.description: The blizzardborn ignores the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} condition from falling snow.

cE9GHCJxhOHcgxgi.name: Shattering Ice
cE9GHCJxhOHcgxgi.description:
Trigger An enemy hits the blizzardborn with an attack that deals physical damage

Effect A portion of the blizzardborn's body shatters into an explosion of razor sharp ice crystals and blinding snow that deals [[/r {2d6}[piercing]]]{2d6 piercing damage} to opponents in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save). Anyone who fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round (or 3 rounds on a critical failure).

fUyM5YcNhV5dlwTV.name: Ice Burrow
fUyM5YcNhV5dlwTV.description: The blizzardborn can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through ice or snow with a Speed of 20 feet. It moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Blodeuwedd.name: Blodeuwedd
Blodeuwedd.publicNotes:
The mysterious blodeuwedds dwell in those parts of the world where the boundaries between the Material Plane and the First World have worn thin, or around portals between the two planes. Their link with such regions of the natural world is so strong that it rivals the bond shared between nymphs and places of great natural beauty, yet none would look upon a blodeuwedd and mistake them for something as elegant as a nymph.

Although blodeuwedds share certain traits with nymphs, their role as guardians of the pathways between this world and the First World prevents them from forming as powerful a magical bond with the natural world. Never truly a part of either reality yet forced to keep watch over both, blodeuwedds tend to grow cynical and sharp-tongued toward any who would seek travel from one realm to the other, regardless of their actual goals.

5pXnmJAJ3WP1fA9Z.name: 植物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Plants (Constant)
5pXnmJAJ3WP1fA9Z.description: 你可以对植物提出问题，从植物获得回答，但该法术不会令植物比正常更为友好或者比正常更有智慧。大多数通常植物对周围的世界仅有直觉的认识，所以它们无法认出生物的细节，或者了解任何其周围环境以外的世界。聪明的植物怪物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

8RH2spsc79xmzAXn.name: Allergen Aura
8RH2spsc79xmzAXn.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A blodeuwedd exudes a 30-foot aura of pollen and irritating allergens. A non-plant living creature that begins its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}. A creature that succeeds at its save is then temporarily immune to the allergen aura for 24 hours.

A blodeuwedd can suppress this aura or activate it again as a free action.

5t9D4gKM7JVpBSf6.name: Wild Empathy
5t9D4gKM7JVpBSf6.description: The blodeuwedd can use Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} on and make very simple @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{Requests} of animals.

JtEaK5YV5AgypBAF.name: Change Shape
JtEaK5YV5AgypBAF.description:
A blodeuwedd can take on the appearance of a single unique humanoid or the form of a prairie owl.

When in humanoid form, the blodeuwedd loses its claw attack.

In owl form, its statistics change as follows:

  • Size Small;
  • Speed fly 60 feet;
  • Melee a talons [[/r {1d20+15} #Attack]]{+15}, Damage [[/r {1d3+1}[slashing]]]{1d3+1}.

A blodeuwedd can return to their normal form as a free action.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

CAKfIK6WRhkgpCW2.name: Living Footsteps
CAKfIK6WRhkgpCW2.description: Every Stride action taken by a blodeuwedd causes small plants, grasses, and wildflowers to sprout from the ground, though they can suppress this effect if they desire. In a region or terrain that wouldn't normally support plant life, these plants thrive for 1 minute before withering away.

VwEyLSgIQwBeoPyV.name: Nature's Infusion
VwEyLSgIQwBeoPyV.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect While surrounded by any field or fertile plain, a blodeuwedd can infuse themself with borrowed life energy from nearby plants and nutrients in the ground. The blodeuwedd gains 15 temporary Hit Points that last for 1 hour.

Blue Dracolisk.name: Blue Dracolisk
Blue Dracolisk.publicNotes: Dracolisks are rare magical crossbreeds of chromatic dragons and basilisks. None now know how they first came to be, but they have proven viable and can breed with one another as well as with basilisks. While a dracolisk appears much like a young true dragon of its parent type, its eight legs are an immediate indication that it is something more. Its coloration varies, depending on the nature of its draconic ancestry, though it's lighter on its underside and darker near its wing tips. A typical dracolisk is 15 feet long and weighs 3,000 pounds.

bwZ7BYouujVO39kJ.name: Draconic Resistance
bwZ7BYouujVO39kJ.description: A dracolisk has resistance 10 to the type of damage it produces with its breath weapon.

zaLf6csWyorRHycA.name: Petrifying Glance
zaLf6csWyorRHycA.description:
Trigger A creature within 30 feet that the dracolisk can see starts its turn

Effect The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save. If it fails, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute as its body stiffens.

nhn4UFoQny0X750B.name: Breath Weapon
nhn4UFoQny0X750B.description:
The dracolisk breathes a gout of energy based on its draconic heritage, as noted below. This breath weapon deals [[/r {6d10}[electricity]]]{6d10 electricity damage}, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true] save.

The dracolisk can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Blue @Template[type:line|distance:60] of electricity

gL7E79l3yS72fXPo.name: Petrifying Gaze
gL7E79l3yS72fXPo.description:
The dracolisk stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save. If it fails and has not already been slowed by Petrifying Glance or this ability, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. If the creature already was slowed by this ability or Petrifying Glance, a failed save causes the creature to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} permanently.

A creature petrified in this manner can be instantly restored to flesh by being coated (not just splashed) with fresh dracolisk or basilisk blood no more than 1 hour old. A single dracolisk contains enough blood to coat [[/r 1d4+2 #Medium creatures]] Medium creatures in this manner.

4NE1llNXfbsRiHmP.name: Savage Jaws
4NE1llNXfbsRiHmP.description: The dracolisk makes a single Strike with its jaws. If the attack hits, it deals [[/r {4d12+16}[piercing]]]{4d12+16 piercing damage} (versatile S). This counts as two attacks for its multiple attack penalty.

Blue-Ringed Octopus.name: Blue-Ringed Octopus
Blue-Ringed Octopus.publicNotes: While relatively small, the blue-ringed octopus is particularly venomous for its size.

RniBjxUV8FfeP05P.name: Blue-Ringed Octopus Venom
RniBjxUV8FfeP05P.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6 poison damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} (1 round)

iJjnT8l7EIEaChZu.name: Camouflage
iJjnT8l7EIEaChZu.description: The blue-ringed octopus can change the color of its skin to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} even if it doesn't have cover.

DA9qmvZn2NX8sUkj.name: Jet
DA9qmvZn2NX8sUkj.description: The blue-ringed octopus moves up to 60 feet in a straight line through the water without triggering reactions.

mqsn67bFzywwGQ10.name: Toxic Bite
mqsn67bFzywwGQ10.description:
Requirements The blue-ringed octopus has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}

Effect The blue-ringed octopus makes a beak Strike against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it injects additional poison, causing its venom to gain the virulent trait.

Bodak.name: Bodak
Bodak.publicNotes:
When a living, sentient humanoid is exposed to an extreme expression of supernatural evil, the experience can irrevocably damn the victim, crushing their mind and ripping out their soul in an appalling, unholy transformation that results in a creature that's anathema to life-the bodak.

The shreds of physicality that survive this absolute corruption serve only to enhance the humanoid's profoundly disturbing appearance. The bodak's body is horrifically twisted, as though it's locked in a convulsion of agony and terror. Its desiccated and hairless flesh bears an otherworldly, pearlescent sheen, strung taut across a malformed skeleton that reduces its gait to a slow shamble. But most disturbing of all are its eyes, set in a drooping, melted visage with scant remains of its former facial structure. These eyes, sunken deep into their sockets, nevertheless glow with an unholy light, stare with unremitting malevolence, and constantly weep noxious vapor.

Fragmented memories of a prior existence filtered through a vengeful hatred of the living lead the bodak to try to return to those places it once knew. If successful, it assaults former friends, acquaintances, and loved ones with its murderous gaze and an incomprehensible torrent of gibberish laced with vile curses, accusations, and threats-an assault that often leads to the victims rising as newly formed bodaks themselves.

KswFDiMoMctr0zFY.name: Draining Glance
KswFDiMoMctr0zFY.description:
Trigger A living creature within 30 feet that the bodak can perceive with its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.sebk9XseMCRkDqRg]{Lifesense} starts its turn

Effect The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23] save. If it fails, the bodak regains 5 Hit Points and the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

mS3DC54HONPgp9Pg.name: Sunlight Vulnerability
mS3DC54HONPgp9Pg.description: If exposed to direct sunlight, the bodak can't use actions with the death trait and it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the bodak ends its turn in sunlight. If the bodak loses all its actions this way, it is destroyed.

z3NGGrVV1V5tnFUX.name: Bodak Spawn
z3NGGrVV1V5tnFUX.description: Any humanoid who dies while @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} by a bodak rises as an autonomous bodak 24 hours after its death.

Sg3CFomZepZdIWcH.name: Death Gaze
Sg3CFomZepZdIWcH.description:
The bodak stares at a living creature within 30 feet that it can sense with its @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.sebk9XseMCRkDqRg]{Lifesense}. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save. If the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained}, the bodak gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to 5 times the value of the drained condition the target gained.

Multiple exposures to this ability can increase a creature's drained condition to a maximum of 4. If the bodak is destroyed, any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} condition a creature has gained from Death Gaze are removed.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is doomed 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 4}.

Bog Mummy.name: Bog Mummy
Bog Mummy.publicNotes:
The cultural practice of mummifying the dead is not the only way a body can become preserved, nor is it the only route that gives rise to these disease-spreading undead monstrosities.

Bog mummies (also called peat mummies or mire mummies) rarely, if ever, leave their marshy realms. Less powerful than their more notorious artificially preserved kin, bog mummies are preserved not by agents introduced during rituals but by the natural elements present in the airless, acidic morass of a peat bog or muddy swamp. While corpses preserved in this manner can certainly rise from the mire as bog mummies as the result of a curse by fell powers or the directed influence of a necromancer, the vast majority of them animate from a seething need for vengeance or to pursue some dire agenda left unfinished at the time of death-often because the creature was slain or otherwise betrayed. The nature of tthis emotional tie to life and the emotional power of the deceased compel unlife beyond death, while the preservative qualities of the bog within which the body was disposed of does the rest.

Although most bog mummies are motivated by vengeance, many fulfill their dark yearnings with general violence. Filled with wrath and hatred for the living, they mercilessly attack any living creatures that dare to venture into their dismal domains. Their agonized moans echo over their putrid homes, driving away most natural life dwelling therein and often alerting travelers to the potential danger that lies beneath the surface.

HLcMADTgT1nixxce.name: Breath of the Bog
HLcMADTgT1nixxce.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that begins its turn within the area feels as if its lungs were filling with water and must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19] save or be unable to speak or breathe. The creature can still hold its breath and can attempt a new saving throw at the end of its turn.

A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to breath of the bog for 24 hours.

AWNveQn0EQ1aYORU.name: Rise Up
AWNveQn0EQ1aYORU.description:
Trigger A creature walks on top of a bog mummy that lies buried in the mud or peat below

Requirements Initiative has not yet been rolled

Effect The bog mummy automatically notices the creature and Burrows before rolling initiative.

XmKUjz23s0dNFOYW.name: Bog Rot
XmKUjz23s0dNFOYW.description:
This affliction can't be reduced below stage 1, nor can the damage from it be healed, until it's successfully treated with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} or a similar effect; the affliction can then be removed as normal for a disease. A creature killed by bog rot melts into a noxious sludge and can't be resurrected except by a 7th‑level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.kqhPt9344UkcGVYO]{Resurrect} ritual or similar magic

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 minute)

Stage 2 [[/r {3d6}[negative]]]{3d6 negative damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 day)

Bog Strider.name: Bog Strider
Bog Strider.publicNotes:
The insectile bog striders call themselves seshes, but they take no offense at those who use the more common vernacular to refer to them. They resemble upright water striders with four legs, two arms, and powerful mandibles. Bog striders can move about on water like solid ground, chasing down prey or fleeing from predators across the water. They rarely leave the swampy rivers and lakes they call home. Bog striders stand 5 feet tall and weigh approximately 150 pounds.

A bog strider's diet consists almost entirely of meat, but they prefer to feed only on animals, as they consider the consumption of the flesh of any sapient creature a taboo.

In sesh society, each individual is expected to serve equally in all efforts to ensure the society's survival against the more aggressive creatures often found in or near their swampland homes. In addition, each member of the community is expected to develop a skill that contributes to the community's prosperity, and by extension, the continued survival of the species. Traditionally, female bog striders are builders and artisans while males are hunters and gatherers, but often such roles aren't limited to a single gender, as every member of a small community pitches in to help as they can.

EguLo1LUzA4CQ1Qi.name: Deep Breath
EguLo1LUzA4CQ1Qi.description: A bog strider can hold their breath for 2 hours.

vEMwAfv76TagQTy9.name: Hurl Net
vEMwAfv76TagQTy9.description:
Requirements The bog strider is holding a net in two hands

Effect The bog strider hurls their net to hamper a foe. They make a ranged Strike (with a +10 modifier) against a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet. On a hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. On a critical hit, the creature is instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}. The DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} the net is 16. A creature adjacent to the target can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with the net to remove it from the target.

W8NWW39lZmTUYk0e.name: 踏浪 Water Sprint
W8NWW39lZmTUYk0e.description: The bog strider Strides up to three times in a straight line across smooth water. They can make a single Strike against a creature at the end of this movement.

CwSvR6GqNWvMMxwR.name: Water Stride
CwSvR6GqNWvMMxwR.description: The bog strider can stand and move on the surface of water or other liquids without falling through. The bog strider can go underwater if they wish, but they must @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swim} to do so.

Bone Prophet.name: Bone Prophet
Bone Prophet.publicNotes: The speakers for the dead known as bone prophets hold an esteemed place as voices for their decapitated god. Burial rites, necromantic rituals, and the delivery of cryptic utterances supposedly whispered to them by Ydersius all fall under the dominion of these priests. Bone prophets often raise fallen aapophs as skeletons.

36CmhzOplKDvSnh4.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At will)
36CmhzOplKDvSnh4.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

Faz79fumsbTV2o3W.name: 镜影术(随意施法) Mirror Image (At will)
Faz79fumsbTV2o3W.description:
三个你的幻象在你的位置旋转，令想要攻击攻击你的人可能会命中一个幻象，而不是你本人。任何要命中你的攻击会有随机概率命中你的一个幻象，而不是你本身。如果三个幻象均存在，有四分之一的几率命中你（1d4骰出1）。如果两个幻象存在，有三分之一的概率命中你（1d6骰出1-2）。仅有一个幻象时，概率为二分之一（1d6骰出1-3）。

当一个幻象被命中时，它会被摧毁。如果一个攻击骰没有命中你的AC，但是也没有大失败，它会摧毁一个幻象，但是没有额外的效果（即使该攻击在失败时通常会有效果）。如果一次攻击骰大成功，并且将命中一个幻象，一个幻象被摧毁，并且攻击骰变为对你的一次成功攻击。当所有幻象被摧毁时，该法术结束。

p7rWr63C3HZqpS21.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
p7rWr63C3HZqpS21.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

jZget5HVHnwqjGr2.name: 腹语术(随意施法) Ventriloquism (At will)
jZget5HVHnwqjGr2.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

TzbvlBarJ1dDLVDB.name: +1 Striking Staff
TzbvlBarJ1dDLVDB.description: This long piece of wood can aid in walking and deliver a mighty blow.

HyVnK39Qbmr02ZZS.name: Religious Symbol of Ydersius
HyVnK39Qbmr02ZZS.description: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity as a divine focus to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol must be held in one hand to use it.

3c01H24sjgfJHyvI.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

o4iEKaEBIwAr18XF.name: +4 Status Bonus on Will Saves vs. Mental

VRDZl6y3aAge5VyP.name: Raise Serpent
VRDZl6y3aAge5VyP.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The bone prophet animates corpses of snakes, serpentfolk, or similar serpentine creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. Any flesh on the bodies sloughs off, and they rise as skeletons. The bone prophet can raise one Large creature as a skeletal giant or up to three Medium creatures as skeletal champions; the equipment and attacks might be different depending on the corpses' possessions.

These skeletons have the minion trait and are under the bone prophet's control; the bone prophet can give all these minions the same command with a single action that has the concentrate trait. Any skeletal minions that still remain after 10 minutes crumble to dust.

pkqZFkDwe6SFvUXX.name: Serpentfolk Venom
pkqZFkDwe6SFvUXX.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4 poison damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {2d4}[poison]]]{2d4 poison damage} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 round)

Bottlenose Dolphin.name: Bottlenose Dolphin
Bottlenose Dolphin.publicNotes: The bottlenose dolphin is the most common and widespread species of dolphin. They are social predators who hunt shallow seas and rivers in large family groups called pods. Sailors are fond of bottlenose dolphins and frequently tell tales of how they save drowning fishers or kill sharks with blows from their powerful snouts.

TBp1tYUPtYoOEonO.name: Aquatic Echolocation
TBp1tYUPtYoOEonO.description: A bottlenose dolphin can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range, but only underwater.

khgGPSxgTQcgev3o.name: Deep Breath
khgGPSxgTQcgev3o.description: A bottlenose dolphin can hold its breath for 2 hours.

jN9qLXiQfaOBlFfC.name: Ramming Speed
jN9qLXiQfaOBlFfC.description: The bottlenose dolphin @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.c8TGiZ48ygoSPofx]{Swims} twice and then makes a snout Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. A Large or smaller creature hit by this attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Bralani.name: Bralani
Bralani.publicNotes: Bralanis embody the freedom of fair competition, embracing opportunities to test their skills against worthy foes and bring mortals together with the thrill of good-natured sports and contests. Their interest in constructive conflict also extends to higher stakes, such as diplomatic negotiations. In these cases, bralanis ensure that neither side's desires are crushed by the other's and work as mediators when needed. They believe in friendly contests to diffuse tension. When discussions are going well, bralanis step back, allowing the participants to shape their own futures. They delight in sailing through violent storms as wind, basking in the raw energy.

zD1p5wo8W7il4Xw4.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
zD1p5wo8W7il4Xw4.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

ManCGXxwaYWyKQzU.name: 气化形体(随意施法) Gaseous Form (At will)
ManCGXxwaYWyKQzU.description:
目标变化成气体形态。在这个状态中，目标形态不定，并且失去任何AC上的物品价值。它对物理伤害获得抗力8，并且免疫精准伤害。它无法施放法术，激活物品，或者使用具有攻击或者操作特征的动作。它获得10尺飞行速度，并且可以钻过超小型的裂隙。目标可以解消该法术。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sILRkGTwoBywy0BU]{法术效果：气化形体}

Cj6s7OuIDPePwy5R.name: 造风术(随意施法) Gust of Wind (At will)
Cj6s7OuIDPePwy5R.description:
一团暴风从你的掌中喷出，从你施放法术时所在位置直吹到线形终点。这团风吹灭所有小的非魔法火焰，吹散云和雾，吹起负载轻或者更低的物体，并且会推动更大的物体。区域中大型或者更小的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。在之后进入风中的大型或者更小的生物也必须在进入时尝试该豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物无法顶风移动。

失败 该生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。如果它在飞行，它改为承受大失败效果。

大失败 该生物被沿风向推离30尺，倒地，并且承受2d6钝击伤害。

BAJs3gJ34CxRZX5W.name: Fair Competition
BAJs3gJ34CxRZX5W.description: Once per day, a bralani can spend 1 minute to bless willing creatures within 100 feet who are about to participate in a contest. This blessing lasts 24 hours. If a blessed creature cheats or uses the contest to harm another, the creature grows visibly ill, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} and unable to remove this condition for the duration or until they withdraw from the competition. At the end of the contest, participants who competed fairly find it easier to negotiate and understand their opponent's perspective. For 1 hour, they gain a +2 status bonus to Diplomacy checks and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.KygTSeDvsFoSO6HW]{Recall Knowledge} checks that directly pertain to their opponents.

arLLxzC2PfddWyB8.name: Whirlwind Blast
arLLxzC2PfddWyB8.description: The bralani generates a @Template[type:line|distance:20] of scouring wind that deals [[/r {7d6}[bludgeoning]]]{7d6 bludgeoning damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true] save). It can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

scNTrSPuw9K5tRtq.name: Wind Form
scNTrSPuw9K5tRtq.description: A bralani flies at full Speed in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{Gaseous Form}.

Brood Leech Swarm.name: Brood Leech Swarm
Brood Leech Swarm.publicNotes: Most smaller species of leeches do not tend to swarm, but brood leeches are prone to gathering in seething, undulant mats of squirming gluttony. When they gather in sufficient numbers to swarm, they eschew the stealth of a lone leech's feeding methods in favor of swift and merciless feeding. In these situations, their mild venom can affect much larger creatures than their usual prey.

ome4gBGaz20PH3OU.name: Blood Draining Bites
ome4gBGaz20PH3OU.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] and is exposed to brood leech swarm venom.

SZrUoVGK2e5HE1dm.name: Brood Leech Swarm Venom
SZrUoVGK2e5HE1dm.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and -5-foot status penalty to Speed (1 round)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and -10-foot status penalty to Speed (1 round).

Brownie.name: Brownie
Brownie.publicNotes:
Brownies make their homes in the trunks of hollow trees, small earthy burrows, and even under porches or within the crawl spaces of farmhouses. Often attired in clothes that appear to be made of plants or leaves, brownies wear belts lined with pouches and tools. Whatever language they choose to speak is often is riddled with odd pronunciations and colloquialisms. Their manner of speaking might call upon turns of phrase that are decades or even centuries out of vogue, for example, or they might mix up their metaphors in strange ways. It almost seems as if brownies adopt these quirky ways of speaking intentionally-certainly they do not react favorably to corrections to their chatter. There's often no swifter way to annoy a brownie than to try to correct its grammar. Brownies stand barely 2 feet tall and weigh about 20 pounds.

When facing danger, brownies rarely engage in combat, preferring instead to confound and confuse their attackers in order to buy enough time for escape. Content with honest toil and the love of their kin, brownies maintain a pacifist nature, harassing creatures only to run them off or punish them for an insult. Despite this nature, all brownies carry a blade. They refer to their swords with a hint of disgust, and jokingly call their blades their "final trick," reserving their use for the direst of circumstances.

Honest to a fault, brownies take freely but always repay their debt through work or leave something behind as an offering. They may eat an apple from a farmer's orchard but harvest the entire tree as repayment. A brownie might eat an entire pie left on a windowsill, only to straighten up the kitchen or wash the dishes. A brownie can share a home with a family for years and years while avoiding detection. A family that is aware of a brownie in their midst usually finds this a beneficial relationship and leaves dishes of milk, pieces of fruit, trinkets, and sometimes even wine as gifts. In exchange, the resident brownie keeps the home clean, mends clothes, repairs tools, and shoos away vermin and small predators. Bragging about having a brownie in the house is the best way to lose one. Brownies distrust foxes and fear wolves, and they avoid farms with dogs.

4dJ4DHIq0hvHbkYj.name: 次元门(仅限自身) Dimension Door (Self Only)
4dJ4DHIq0hvHbkYj.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

4Uoy7JHv0Ea9SrCr.name: Baffling Bluff
4Uoy7JHv0Ea9SrCr.description:
The brownie's antics can confuse and disorient a creature. When the brownie uses Baffling Bluff, it targets a single creature within 30 feet; that creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save.

The target is temporarily immune to Baffling Bluff for 1 minute.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is fooled momentarily and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the next melee Strike the brownie makes against it before the end of the brownie's next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target is confused for 1 minute. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the confused condition.

Bythos.name: Bythos
Bythos.publicNotes: The bythos is a guardian of space and time, and at all times seeks out those who misuse planar and temporal magic. A bythos is a roughly humanoid creature with four arms and a body made of swirling clouds and mist. Despite its appearance, its body feels like dry stone. A bythos seeks out paradoxes caused by irresponsible planar or dimensional travelers and repairs breaches where the barriers between planes have become thin or damaged. If the mortals responsible remain in the area and cannot be convinced to cease their activities, the bythos has no qualms about removing them. Using its ability to manipulate time, a bythos might cause an opponent to quickly die of old age as time speeds up around them, or cause a target to disappear from time and space.
Bythos.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

fjNBgwnXVFm9Yc36.name: 卜筮术(随意施法) Augury (At will)
fjNBgwnXVFm9Yc36.description:
你瞥见未来的模糊片段。在施放该法术时，询问一个特定行为的结果。该法术可以预测30分钟内的未来的结果，并且会揭示GM认为最为可能的后续结果。

  • 吉 该结果将会是好的。
  • 凶 该结果可能不妙。
  • 吉且凶 该结果好坏参半。
  • 平 不会有明显好或坏的结果。

GM暗骰@Check[type:flat|dc:6|traits:secret]检定。如果失败，结果永远是 "平" 。这令 "平" 的结果究竟是否准确无法被判明。如果任何人询问和先前施放的卜筮术相同的主题，使用第一次施放时得到的暗骰结果。如果环境情况发生变化，有可能会得到不同的结果。

GXXWozDHxwpERohz.name: 禁锢术() Imprisonment (Temporal stasis only)
GXXWozDHxwpERohz.description:
你执行仪式来禁锢一个生物，禁锢方式需要从多个模式中选择一种。尽管部分版本的仪式会提供所有禁锢模式，但大多数版本只包含了仅仅其中一种或几种模式。无论你选择何种禁锢模式，该效果都是无法被反制的，不过可以被 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{解锢术 Freedom}所解放。部分模式的禁锢术可以通过其他方式结束。因为完成仪式需要在执行仪式的整个过程中都维持在与目标距离10尺的范围内，所以通常来说需要你先制服目标再执行仪式。

  • 锁链 你用锁链束缚目标，使其无法使用交谈之外的任何动作。以任何方式尝试靠近、伤害锁链、或者解放被困生物的其他生物均需要成功通过意志豁免，否则便永远无法再这么做。锁链的硬度为5 x 禁锢术仪式的法术等级，生命值为硬度数值的两倍。摧毁锁链可以解放目标。
  • 物化（9环或更高环级） 你把目标生物变为1寸高、或者头部以下的身体化为烟云样子的虚无形态。无论何种形式，你都会把它困到宝石、罐子、瓶子、灯或者类似的容器里。该生物会停止老化，而且变得不再需要进食或饮水。该生物仍然能够感受到周遭环境，且能够在容器内移动和说话，但是它无法使用任何其他动作。破坏容器会杀死目标而非释放它。此种禁锢术同时还是变化（transmutation）魔法。
  • 密牢（仅限10环） 你把目标以假死状态埋葬到地下深处，放逐至现实之外，因此任何手段都无法靠近目标。你还防止了任何预言魔法揭示出使用此禁锢术的地点。@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish}这样强大的魔法能够揭示出禁锢术的位置，但即便是这样的魔法，也无法将目标从密牢中释放；只有10环的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4ddJSjC9Zz5DX0oG]{解锢术 Freedom} 才能做到这一点。
  • 监牢 目标完全无法离开由你选定的某片特定区域或建筑，比如某个牢房或封闭的洞穴。该魔法也能够防止目标通过破坏自己的监牢——无论是以直接或间接的方式——来逃脱。若目标生物的监牢完全被某种外部力量所摧毁，该生物便会重获自由，尽管对于某些大型或天然的监牢来说，此情况基本无法发生。
  • 沉眠（睡眠效果） 你让目标陷入了永恒的睡眠。它会停止老化，而且不再需要进食或饮水。若有生物真诚地爱着目标（无论是亲情、爱情或者其他类似情感），并且真诚地对目标作出1次用于表示情感的肢体行为，就能够让目标从睡眠中解放出来。此种禁锢术同时还是惑控（enchantment）魔法。
  • 永恒静滞 你把目标置入到时间洪流之外，使其陷入假死状态。该生物不会变老，也不会受到任何来源于正常时间流（normal time stream）的任何效果影响。在施放此仪式时，你能够随意指定任意时间长度的静滞期；在这段时间结束之后，静滞便会结束。与其他模式的禁锢术不同，永恒静滞可以被@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o6YCGx4lycsYpww4]{加速术 Haste} 反制。此种禁锢术同时还是变化（transmutation）魔法。

大成功 你禁锢了目标。你可以使用通常来说需要一个额外法术环级（1 additional spell level）的禁锢术模式，或者让任何尝试使用解锢术（freedom）仪式解放目标时所进行的相关检定承受-2环境减值。

成功 你禁锢了目标。

失败 你未能禁锢目标。

大失败 你把自己和次要施法者以相同的方式禁锢起来，以取代原本的禁锢目标。

升阶 (9环级) 除了其他模式之外，你还能够使用禁锢术的物化模式，并且你能够以至多18级的生物为目标。该仪式的基本开销增加至2000gp。

升阶 (10环级) 除了其他模式之外，你还能够使用禁锢术的物化模式和密牢模式，并且你能够以至多20级的生物为目标。该仪式的基本开销增加至6000gp。

rChIZqOgM2sc4XDf.name: 次元锚(随意施法) Dimensional Anchor (At will)
rChIZqOgM2sc4XDf.description:
你妨碍目标传送以及在次元之间旅行的能力。次元锚会尝试反制任何传送效果，以及任何移动目标到另一个位面的效果。法术持续时间由目标的意志豁免决定。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 该效果持续时间为1分钟。

失败 该效果持续时间为10分钟。

大失败 该效果持续时间为1小时。

52OH24WzpzdT3ptJ.name: Envisioning
52OH24WzpzdT3ptJ.description:
When a bythos conveys information, it does so wordlessly through psychic projections. This acts as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.kdhbPaBMK1d1fpbA]{Telepathy} with a range of 100 feet but is understandable to all creatures regardless of whether they have a language.

The meaning to non-aeons can be vague and is often mysterious. A bythos can use this ability to communicate flawlessly with any other aeon on the same plane.

3c01H24sjgfJHyvI.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+1状态加值 +1 Status to All Saves vs. Magic

Ai8J0A4OuhkDr7Cx.name: Confusing Gaze
Ai8J0A4OuhkDr7Cx.description:
30 feet.

A creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save. If it fails, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} for 1 round (or [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} on a critical failure).

x5lmNBtvBd1z0Azh.name: Temporal Reversion
x5lmNBtvBd1z0Azh.description:
Trigger The bythos fails or critically fails a check

Frequency once per day

Effect The bythos rerolls the triggering check and takes the better result.

4PafOhYr090tdIQE.name: Aging Strikes
4PafOhYr090tdIQE.description:
The bythos make two fist Strikes against a single target. If both Strikes hit, the target attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] save. Creatures that don't get weaker with age or don't age are immune (GM's discretion).

If a creature becomes clumsy 4, drained 4, and enfeebled 4 due to Aging Strikes, it dies of old age.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or increases each of these conditions by 1. This effect is cumulative with other aging strikes from bythoses, to a maximum of clumsy 4, drained 4, and enfeebled 4.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, or increases these conditions by 2.

WPlqW6SIzbL8jscs.name: Focused Gaze
WPlqW6SIzbL8jscs.description: The bythos focuses its gaze on a creature it can see within 30 feet. The target must attempt a save against the bythos's confusing gaze. A bythos can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per turn.

Qgjku7yO52q21NCG.name: Temporal Flurry
Qgjku7yO52q21NCG.description: The bythos makes four fist Strikes. Its multiple attack penalty increases normally with each attack.

bBQMy1lr5xW6rBgj.name: Temporal Strike
bBQMy1lr5xW6rBgj.description:
The bythos touches a creature or object to displace it from time. The target attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success Time flows around the target; the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target disappears from the present moment and reappears in the same location [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} later as if no time had passed for it. If a creature or object occupies that space when the target returns, the target appears in the closest available space to its original location.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for an extra [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} after it returns.

Cairn Wight.name: Cairn Wight
Cairn Wight.publicNotes:
Jealous guardians of tombs, barrows, and sepulchers, cairn wights usually spawn from necromantic rituals. For those mortals who cannot abide the thought of separation from their earthly possessions, the undead existence offered by transformation into a cairn wight can be tempting. Perhaps as frequently, particularly avaricious and wealthy royalty or merchants seek out victims to transform into cairn wights to guard their precious wealth for all time.

Only in the rarest instances is the greed of a mortal strong enough to spontaneously transform them into a cairn wight without a dark ritual or the intercession of a powerful divine being. On those occasions, however, the resultant wight exhibits unmatched viciousness and likely owns rare treasure indeed.

As guardians of material possessions, cairn wights are supernaturally bound to the armaments they wore during the ritual used to create them. They can spread their necromantic powers into the weapons they wield. A slash from a cairn wight's sword channels life from the victim into the wight.

aWo3aVa2XXkGsrLY.name: Final Spite
aWo3aVa2XXkGsrLY.description:
Trigger The cairn wight is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect The cairn wight makes a Strike before being destroyed. It doesn't gain any temporary HP from drain life on this Strike.

gixaFzYqsyV9bsLi.name: Cairn Wight Spawn
gixaFzYqsyV9bsLi.description: A living humanoid slain by a cairn wight's weapon or claw Strike rises as a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-2.sMNqIHHxcVBXG08h]{Spawned Wight} after [[/br 1d4 #Cairn Wight Spawn Transformation]]{1d4 rounds}. This spawned wight is under the command of the cairn wight that killed it. It doesn't have drain life or cairn wight spawn and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} for as long as it is a spawned wight. If its creator dies, the spawned wight becomes a full-fledged, autonomous cairn wight; it regains its free will, gains drain life and cairn wight spawn, and is no longer clumsy.

KTxjm0shb9zyrh0z.name: Drain Life
KTxjm0shb9zyrh0z.description: When the cairn wight damages a living creature with a melee Strike, using an unarmed attack or its bound weapon, the cairn wight gains [[/r 5 #Temporary Hit Points]]{5 temporary Hit Points} and the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the cairn wraith increases the drained condition value by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

eG5iE2SpiXdvquWh.name: Funereal Dirge
eG5iE2SpiXdvquWh.description:
The cairn wight chants a low, haunting melody. Living creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50 feet} must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save.

The cairn wight can't chant a new Funereal Dirge for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Funereal Dirge]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} and takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against drain life.

Calathgar.name: Calathgar
Calathgar.publicNotes:
Calathgars are mysterious predatory plants that grow in the depths of the densest frozen forests, realms where icicles rarely melt from snow-cloaked trees. A calathgar's blue flowers grow from 3 to 5 feet across (with specimens as wide as 10 feet reported), while the plant itself stands just under 4 feet in height and weighs up to 50 pounds when heavy with seeds.

Calathgars' psyches are alien to most sapient creatures. They have little interest in emotion, culture, or ambition, yet they have nearly flawless memories and can share experiences with other calathgars by scent (imprecise) as easily as humanoids can pass on information by speech. While calathgars themselves can't speak, they can typically be reasoned with-though like most protective parents, an incensed calathgar defending its young is rarely in a mood to listen.

rdri6pl6hY1glOfy.name: Cold Healing
rdri6pl6hY1glOfy.description:
Calathgars are healed by cold. Anytime a calathgar would take cold damage, it instead regains [[/r {1d6}[healing]]]{1d6 Hit Points} (regardless of the amount of damage the cold effect would have caused).

In severe cold or colder environments,9 calathgars gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{Fast Healing} 1.

UbbiLTnNP4WGrar5.name: Mold Mulch
UbbiLTnNP4WGrar5.description: When a calathgar is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it immediately decays and dies, transforming into a 5-foot patch of mold (or a 10-foot patch of mold if it was killed by fire damage). This patch of mold persists for 1 minute, during which time it deals [[/r {3d6}[cold]]]{3d6 cold damage} to any creature that begins its turn in this area, or [[/r {1d6}[cold]]]{1d6 cold damage} to any creature that begins its turn in an adjacent square. The mold patch decays away after an hour, but it can be destroyed before then (treat each 5-foot square as an object with Hardness 0, 10 Hit Points, BT 5, immunity to cold, piercing, and slashing damage; the mold deals half its regular cold damage once it's broken).

s23ZMm1sJc7XLyKW.name: Seed Spray
s23ZMm1sJc7XLyKW.description:
The calathgar expels thorny, frozen seeds in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15], dealing [[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} and [[/r {4d6}[cold]]]{4d6 cold damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true] save).

In mild cold or colder environments, these seeds cling to living creatures they strike, dealing [[/r {1d4}[persistent,cold]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Cold Damage}.

The calathgar can't use Seed Spray again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Caligni Slayer.name: Caligni Slayer
Caligni Slayer.publicNotes:
Caligni slayers possess greater occult talents than others of their kind. In most other calignis, the power bartered from the long-lost demigods known as the Forsaken merely burns within. But in caligni slayers, this power is a deep and terrible hunger. Slayers embrace their evil impulses as a result, and they seek to feed on others with their soul harvest ability to keep this supernatural hunger sated. Slayers denied the opportunity to feed descend into paranoia and, eventually, murderous rage.

Delayed feeding improves but never fully restores their composure and patience. Perhaps the greatest manifestation of a slayer's hunger appears at the moment of their death. Upon its last breath, a slayer collapses into itself in a violent, lightless implosion, rather than the blinding eruption of other calignis' deaths, consuming the body itself in a final attempt at satiation.

Slayers view themselves as the cleverest and most gifted of the calignis. They seethe with ill-concealed envy at the position of power caligni stalkers occupy, ever scheming to displace them and claim that power for their own. For their part, stalkers tolerate these machinations as an acceptable price for the talents slayers contribute to an enclave. If necessary, any slayer who grows too ambitious can become a brave sacrifice in battle, for the good of the enclave. In physical stature, slayers fall between the willowy caligni dancers and the diminutive creepers. Stalkers tower above most slayers-yet another source of slayers' envy and resentment.

rcWb1X7tL04A2SNN.name: 黑暗术(随意施法) Darkness (At Will)
rcWb1X7tL04A2SNN.description:
你创造一片黑暗的帷幕，光线无法穿透，并且光源无法在区域中发光。光线无法进入该区域，并且任何非魔法光源，例如火炬或者提灯，在区域中不会发出任何光线，即使其光照可能到达黑暗术之外也是如此。这也会压制等于或低于你的黑暗术环级的魔法光亮。光线无法穿透，所以在区域中的生物无法看到外面。对于外面，这看起来如同一团纯粹黑暗的球。

升阶 (4环级) 即使具有黑暗视觉的生物（但不包括高等黑暗视觉）也几乎无法看穿这黑暗。它们透过黑暗看到的生物视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

u2Swu9GqcWTekOge.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
u2Swu9GqcWTekOge.description:
